mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROJECT ( F_PROJECT_ID, F_PROJECT_NAME, F_GRADLE_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F_COPYRIGHTS, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ projectId }, #{ projectName }, #{ gradleName }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note }, #{ copyrights }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROJECT SET F_PROJECT_NAME = #{ projectName }, F_GRADLE_NAME = #{ gradleName }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note }, F_COPYRIGHTS = #{ copyrights }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_PROJECT_ID = #{ projectId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", T1.F_GRADLE_NAME AS "gradleName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title" FROM T_PROJECT T1 WHERE T1.F_PROJECT_ID = #{ projectId }
